Term_Condition_Description: This policy covers the loss of personal belongings in the event of theft or damage.
This policy covers the medical expenses of the policy holder in case of an accident or illness.
This policy covers the damage to the insured vehicle in case of an accident or natural calamity.
This policy covers the loss of income due to disability caused by an accident or illness.
This policy covers the expenses incurred due to the damage caused by fire or natural calamity.
